data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Ball safe as Oita is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Oita.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
In the minute 3, Oita are caught offside.
Junior Dutra (Shimizu) gets a yellow card.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a Oita throw-in in Shimizu's half.
In the minute 5, Shimizu to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Oita.
Yosuke Kawai is booked for the away team.
In the minute 8, Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroki Kasahara awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Shimizu.
Free kick Shimizu.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Oita take a 1-0 lead thanks to Yuya Takazawa.
That's a fine assist from Yuta Koide.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
In the minute 18, Oita drive forward but Yuya Takazawa is judged offside.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Shimizu.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Hiroki Kasahara awards Oita a goal kick.
In Oita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a Oita throw-in in Shimizu's half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Shimizu at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Goal! Junior Dutra equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Carlinhos Junior with an assist there.
In the minute 29, Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Shimizu are pushing forward but Elsinho's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Oita.
In the minute 34, Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Oita.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
In the minute 36, Shimizu's Junior Dutra misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in Oita.
Hiroki Kasahara has awarded Oita a corner.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Oita's Tatsuya Tanaka is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 43, In Oita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tatsuya Tanaka (Oita) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Hiroki Kasahara awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
In the minute 50, Elsinho (Shimizu) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in high up the field for Oita in Oita.
Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
In the minute 57, Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Shimizu.
In the minute 60, Naoki Nomura is replacing Kazuki Kozuka for the home team.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Oita.
Oita are coming forward and Yoshinori Suzuki gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 62, Shimizu have a goal kick.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Oita in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Oita push upfield and Yuji Hoshi gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Shimizu defence.
Oita takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 70, Shimizu make their first substitution with Hikaru Naruoka replacing Yosuke Kawai.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Yusuke Goto.
The home team replace Yuta Koide with Yamato Machida.
In the minute 72, Kento Haneda is on a sub for Yushi Hasegawa for Oita.
Yusuke Goto is back on his feet again.
Throw-in for Oita close to the penalty box.
In the minute 73, Hiroki Kasahara signals a Oita throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Oita attack and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Naoki Nomura but the ball cannons into the bar!
In the minute 76, Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Tatsuya Tanaka.
Yusuke Goto, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Shota Kaneko is the substitute for Shimizu.
Carlinhos Junior of Shimizu gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 78, Hiroki Kasahara awards Oita a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
The home team replace Yuji Hoshi with Ryosuke Tone.
In the minute 80, Kei Chinen is replacing Yuya Takazawa for the home team.
Oita to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Ball safe as Oita is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Oita in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Shimizu at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Keita Nakamura is on a sub for Junior Dutra for Shimizu.
Shimizu make their fourth substitution with Ryo Okui replacing Kenta Nishizawa.
Throw-in for Shimizu at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Free kick Shimizu.
In the minute 89, Valdo (Shimizu) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Oita's Naoki Nomura has run offside.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Hiroki Kasahara awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Yugo Tatsuta (Shimizu) has received a yellow card from Hiroki Kasahara.
Valdo (Shimizu) has received a first yellow card.
At Showa Denko Dome Oita, Keita Nakamura has been yellow-carded for the away team.
